Description:

If you desperately need to steal something - you've come to the right place. In a city full of dangers, 
there is only one person who is able to perform the most complex order. In comparison, the cruel Baron 
Nortkrest pale and his greedy guardian, the mysterious Queen beggars ardent revolutionaries and 
street dwellers "bottom". His name is Garrett, and he has mastered the art of breaking and entering. 
Plague, war, fighting ... let the rest tremble - and he will steal! 

Imperishable classic returns. A brand new game from the studio Eidos-MontrÃƒÂ©al, given the fans an 
excellent Deus Ex: Human Revolution, revives the best traditions of the legendary series Thief. 
Can you become Master thief and survive on the dark streets of the city, where the blood on 
the streets - as common as gold coins in chests almighty Baron?

Features:
Way of the Master-thief: the unthinkable robbery, stuffing their pockets with the same risk to life
Choose your approach: sneak in the shadows, or use countless tricks reserves the corpses of those 
who fell under the arm Incredible dive: Explore gloomy town in search of answers to the mysterious 
events of the past

Gripping story: diabolical intrigue and confrontation, threatening to destroy the whole world

Features repack

Thief

With Update4
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice 
(text in the game settings, the sound in the installer)
